source: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_NONOTTA_000_001<tab>What's that? Back to help us hand out some more eggs? You are far too kind, friend! Needless to say, we would more than welcome your aid. Here, I have a freshly decorated batch ready to go at any time!
target: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_NONOTTA_000_001<tab>Tu veux bien nous aider à distribuer les Prœufs, alors<var 1D /var>? Tout est prêt, donc c'est quand tu veux, hein<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_SYSTEM_000_002<tab>You can replay the gift-giving task from the quest “Hippity, Hoppity, Happily.” If fortune smiles upon you, you may even encounter individuals who were not present in your initial venture.
target: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_SYSTEM_000_002<tab>Vous pouvez désormais répéter la dis<var 16 /var>tri<var 16 /var>bu<var 16 /var>tion d'œufs de la quête “Chasse aux Prœufs et au bonheur”. Qui sait, vous rencontrerez peut-être quelqu'un d'autre pendant votre tournée<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_Q1_000_000<tab>Begin handing out eggs?
target: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_Q1_000_000<tab>Commencer à distribuer<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_Q2_000_000<tab>Where will you hand out eggs?
target: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_Q2_000_000<tab>Où souhaitez-vous distribuer les Prœufs<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_A2_000_001<tab>By the markets.
target: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_A2_000_001<tab>Près de l'allée commerçante

source: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_A2_000_002<tab>By the Botanists' Guild.
target: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_A2_000_002<tab>Près de la guilde des botanistes

source: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_A2_000_003<tab>By Nophica's Altar.
target: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_A2_000_003<tab>Près de l'autel de Nophica

source: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_A2_000_004<tab>By the Whistling Miller.
target: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_A2_000_004<tab>Près du Meunier sifflotant

source: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_A1_000_005<tab>By Apkallu Falls.
target: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_A1_000_005<tab>Près des chutes de l'Apkallu

source: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_NICOLIAUX_000_010<tab>A decorated egg? For me? How thoughtful!
target: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_NICOLIAUX_000_010<tab>C'est des Prœufs, ça<var 1D /var>? Je peux en avoir<var 1D /var>? Ouaiiiis<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_NICOLIAUX_000_011<tab>There's even a treat inside! Thank you ever so much.
target: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_NICOLIAUX_000_011<tab>Il y a plein de biscuits à l'intérieur<var 1D /var>! Merci<var 1D /var>!!!

source: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_ESUMIYAN_000_012<tab>Your efforts are sincerely appreciated. These seasonal celebrations bring so much joy to the children─and myself, I confess.
target: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_ESUMIYAN_000_012<tab>Je vous remercie. Les enfants ont l'air ravis, eux aussi.

source: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_ESUMIYAN_000_013<tab>Still, I must say...it's been years since I've seen a traveler rabbit in the flesh. I never would have expected to encounter one here.
target: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_ESUMIYAN_000_013<tab>En tout cas, cela faisait bien longtemps que je n'avais pas vu de lapin pérégrin<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_ESUMIYAN_000_014<tab>What's that? That nomenclature is unfamiliar to you? Ah, in the North they are known more...colloquially...as “happy bunnies,” are they not? They're said to usher in smiles and good fortune...
target: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_ESUMIYAN_000_014<tab>Ah, peut-être que cela ne vous dit rien<var 1D /var>! Les habitants des mers du Nord l'appellent le lapin du bonheur, car il est supposé porter chance.

source: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_ESUMIYAN_000_015<tab>Before that─yes, since much older times─they were known as “traveler rabbits.” They have a habit of showing up at your side unannounced, then vanishing off somewhere before you know it. I recall seeing one in the Twelveswood when I was but a child...
target: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_ESUMIYAN_000_015<tab>Il est également connu sous le nom de “lapin pérégrin” en raison de sa tendance à apparaître et disparaître un peu n'importe où. Une fois, quand j'étais enfant, j'en ai même vu un dans la forêt de Sombrelinceul.

source: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_ESUMIYAN_000_016<tab>Ah, but forgive me... You have other places you must be. We can talk another time─pray relax and enjoy the festivities when your work is done.
target: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_ESUMIYAN_000_016<tab>Ah, pardonnez-moi, je ne voulais pas vous assommer avec mes histoires<var 1D /var>! Profitez bien du festival, j'espère que vous vous amuserez bien<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_FORESTLOVINGRABBIT_000_020<tab>Why, I daresay the wood used to fashion those decorations was among the finest I've ever laid eyes on. As always, your eye for quality timber is simply unparalleled.
target: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_FORESTLOVINGRABBIT_000_020<tab>Cette année encore, les décorations sont tout à fait magnifiques. Vous avez vraiment un don pour transformer les matériaux les plus simples en superbes ornements.

source: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_GRASSSTAINEDRABBIT_000_021<tab>You're far too kind, Master Bea─ I mean...my forest-loving, floppy-eared friend. Likewise, I have no doubt the wood rejoiced to find itself in the hands of one who understands it as well as you.
target: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_GRASSSTAINEDRABBIT_000_021<tab>Quel éloge de la part d'un fin connaisseur du bois tel que vous, Beat-... Enfin, je veux dire, du charpentier amoureux des arbres que vous êtes<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_GRASSSTAINEDRABBIT_000_022<tab>...Or should I say “paws”?
target: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_GRASSSTAINEDRABBIT_000_022<tab>Hi hi hi...

source: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_FORESTLOVINGRABBIT_000_023<tab>Ha!
target: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_FORESTLOVINGRABBIT_000_023<tab>Ha ha ha...

source: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_GRASSSTAINEDRABBIT_000_024<tab>Oh! If it isn't <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! How good it is to see you well.
target: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_GRASSSTAINEDRABBIT_000_024<tab>Oh, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>! Comment allez-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_GRASSSTAINEDRABBIT_000_025<tab>An adventurer? I don't believe we've met...
target: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_GRASSSTAINEDRABBIT_000_025<tab>Excusez-moi, mais qui êtes-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_FORESTLOVINGRABBIT_000_026<tab>An egg for me? And what a charming little fellow carrying it. I accept your gift with gratitude.
target: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_FORESTLOVINGRABBIT_000_026<tab>Ah, c'est toi qui distribues les Prœufs, alors<var 1D /var>? Tu es bien mignon<var 1D /var>! Merci beaucoup<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_GRASSSTAINEDRABBIT_000_027<tab>How very clever you are! Though I did hear a rumor of some concern...
target: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_GRASSSTAINEDRABBIT_000_027<tab>Mais qu'ils sont sages<var 1D /var>! Même si j'ai entendu des rumeurs...

source: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_GRASSSTAINEDRABBIT_000_028<tab>Yes, a little bird told me that creatures bearing no small resemblance to you were running wild through the streets of Gridania, trampling our precious greenery...
target: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_GRASSSTAINEDRABBIT_000_028<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Quelque chose<var 1A 01 /var> aurait retourné des plantations un peu partout à travers Nouvelle Gridania...

source: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_FORESTLOVINGRABBIT_000_029<tab>...And nibbling at the bark of our precious trees─a <var 1A 02 /var>most<var 1A 01 /var> disconcerting story if there is any truth to it.
target: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_FORESTLOVINGRABBIT_000_029<tab>Tiens, on m'a raconté la même chose, à moi aussi<var 1D /var>! Je me demande bien <var 1A 02 /var>qui donc<var 1A 01 /var> aurait pu commettre un tel méfait...

source: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_2022ESTCHICKEN_000_030<tab>C-Cluck! Cluck cluck! Cluck...
target: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_2022ESTCHICKEN_000_030<tab>Cot codêêêêt<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_FORESTLOVINGRABBIT_000_031<tab>If my intuition is not mistaken, it appears the little creature is apologizing to us in its own way.
target: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_FORESTLOVINGRABBIT_000_031<tab>Hum... on dirait que vous regrettez vos actions, au moins.

source: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_GRASSSTAINEDRABBIT_000_032<tab>Well, as long as you've learned your lesson, I do believe we can forgive and forget.
target: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_GRASSSTAINEDRABBIT_000_032<tab>Hi hi hi<var 1D /var>! Bien, si vous avez compris, restons-en là. Merci pour les Prœufs<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_GRASSSTAINEDRABBIT_000_033<tab>Thank you for the thoughtful gift, and the happiest of Hatching<var 1F /var>tides to you!
target: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_GRASSSTAINEDRABBIT_000_033<tab>Et merci à vous pour votre aide dans la dis<var 16 /var>tri<var 16 /var>bu<var 16 /var>tion<var 1D /var>! Faites attention à ne pas vous surmener, hein<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_REFINEDRABBIT_000_040<tab>Greetings, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. It is always a pleasure to have you here in Gridania...and 'twould seem you've befriended some rather charming little helpers!
target: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_REFINEDRABBIT_000_040<tab>Tiens, <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((bonsoir)) ((bonjour)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((bonjour)) ((bonsoir)) /var>)) /var><var 1D /var>! Ce petit festival avait l'air amusant, alors j'ai décidé de venir y faire un tour... Et voilà que je tombe sur vous, accompagné<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> de compagnons très mignons<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_REFINEDRABBIT_000_041<tab>Why, what a lovely egg. How very kind of you.
target: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_REFINEDRABBIT_000_041<tab>Un Prœuf...<var 1D /var>? Oh, cela me fait très plaisir<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_RELAXEDRABBIT_000_042<tab>And there's the most toothsome-looking little cake inside! Do stop by the Canopy when we've finished here─I've a brew that will accompany it perfectly.
target: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_RELAXEDRABBIT_000_042<tab>Ah, il est rempli de biscuits, ça tombe bien<var 1D /var>! Dame Kan-E... (tousse)... Euh, que diriez-vous de prendre un thé avec moi<var 1D /var>? J'ai justement des feuilles de très bonne qualité qui accompagneront par<var 16 /var>fai<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment ces petites douceurs.

source: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_REFINEDRABBIT_000_043<tab>I should enjoy that, indeed!
target: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_REFINEDRABBIT_000_043<tab>Quelle excellente idée<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_REFINEDRABBIT_000_044<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, on behalf of all Gridania, allow me to thank you and your little colleagues for making this year's Hatching<var 1F /var>tide so memorable. Once your work has concluded, I hope you will have time to relax and take in the cheer of the season.
target: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_REFINEDRABBIT_000_044<tab>Merci beaucoup pour ces petits cadeaux<var 1D /var>! Amusez-vous bien<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_RELAXEDRABBIT_000_045<tab>You and your new friends are welcome to stop by for a cup of tea as well, should the mood strike you.
target: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_RELAXEDRABBIT_000_045<tab>Fantastique, nous allons nous régaler<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_RELAXEDRABBIT_100_045<tab>...Though I daresay you ought to claim a table sooner rather than later. These sweets will draw adventurers by the droves!
target: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_RELAXEDRABBIT_100_045<tab>Et bien sûr un grand merci à vos petits assistants, également. Profitez bien des festivités.

source: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_RELAXEDRABBIT_000_046<tab>
target: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_RELAXEDRABBIT_000_046<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_WEDGE_000_050<tab>Well, if it isn't <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Fancy meeting you in a place like this!
target: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_WEDGE_000_050<tab>Oh, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, ça fait un bail dis donc<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_BIGGS_000_051<tab>What have we here? A decorative egg with a tasty treat inside? Hah! Thanks, little fellow─don't mind if I do!
target: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_BIGGS_000_051<tab>Un œuf rempli de biscuits<var 1D /var>! Merci<var 1D /var>! En tout cas, ça ne m'étonne pas vraiment de te voir aider à la dis<var 16 /var>tri<var 16 /var>bu<var 16 /var>tion, ça te ressemble bien, tiens<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_WEDGE_000_052<tab>Aren't you a cute one? And your fur is so soft and fluffy!
target: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_WEDGE_000_052<tab>Mais qu'est-ce que t'es choupi, toi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_WEDGE_100_052<tab>Thank you kindly, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_WEDGE_100_052<tab>En tout cas, merci beaucoup <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_BIGGS_000_053<tab>Perhaps you're wondering what we're doing here? It's nothing so exciting, I'm afraid─just performing routine maintenance on the airships. Normally, we'd send our new recruits, but Wedge here <var 1A 02 /var>insisted<var 1A 01 /var> we volunteer for the task ourselves.
target: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_BIGGS_000_053<tab>On est ici pour la maintenance des aéronefs<var 1D /var>! Normalement, c'est le boulot des nouvelles recrues, mais Wedge a insisté pour que ce soit nous qui nous en occupions.

source: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_WEDGE_000_054<tab>Stay home and miss Gridania's famous Hatching<var 1F /var>tide egg hunt? Perish the thought!
target: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_WEDGE_000_054<tab>Ben oui, je voulais voir un peu ce que donnait la chasse aux Prœufs<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_BIGGS_000_055<tab>Speaking of which...just who are these little critters, anyway?
target: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_BIGGS_000_055<tab>Sinon, euh... qu'est-ce que c'est que ce lapin<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_WEDGE_000_056<tab>Wh-Whoa! So <var 1A 02 /var>these<var 1A 01 /var> are the “happy bunnies” rumored to lead those they favor to happiness and good fortune!?
target: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_WEDGE_000_056<tab>Le lapin du bonheur<var 1D /var>? Celui dont on dit qu'il apporte la chance<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_2022ESTUSAGI_000_057<tab><squeak> <squeak>♪
target: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_2022ESTUSAGI_000_057<tab>Kii<var 1D /var>! Kiiiii<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_WEDGE_000_058<tab>What's that, little friend? Happiness lies that way? Could my dearest Tataru be here for the festivities, too? I must go to her at once!
target: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_WEDGE_000_058<tab>Hm<var 1D /var>? Je trouverai le bonheur par là, c'est ça<var 1D /var>? Me dis pas que Tataru est dans le coin<var 1D /var>!? J'y vais tout de suite<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_BIGGS_000_059<tab>Damn it, Wedge! Come back here!
target: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_BIGGS_000_059<tab>Hé, Wedge<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_BIGGS_000_060<tab><sigh> Fool of a Lalafell... I'd best round him up so we can start the repairs <var 1A 02 /var>he<var 1A 01 /var> volunteered us for. Anyroad, thanks for the treats─I look forward to enjoying them with a cup of tea when our work is done. Till next time, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_BIGGS_000_060<tab>Franchement... Excuse-le, d'accord<var 1D /var>? Bon, je ferais mieux d'aller le rejoindre pour qu'on déguste ces biscuits ensemble<var 1D /var>! À la prochaine, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_STRANGERABBIT_000_070<tab>'Tis an unexpected pleasure to meet thee here, my friend.
target: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_STRANGERABBIT_000_070<tab>Eh bien ça... Si je m'attendais à vous croiser ici...

source: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_Q3_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_Q3_000_000<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_A3_000_001<tab>Urianger...?
target: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_A3_000_001<tab>Urianger<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_A3_000_003<tab>A happy Hatching<var 1F /var>tide to thee!
target: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_A3_000_003<tab>C'est la grande fête des œufs<var 1D /var>!♪

source: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_A3_000_004<tab>A most <var 1A 02 /var>egg<var 1A 01 /var>ceedingly <var 1A 02 /var>egg<var 1A 01 /var>cellent Hatching<var 1F /var>tide to thee!
target: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_A3_000_004<tab>Cot cot codêêêêt<var 1D /var>!!!

source: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_STRANGERABBIT_000_071<tab>Why, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>...however didst thou know 'twas <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var>? Though mayhap my present company afforded thee a hint or two...
target: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_STRANGERABBIT_000_071<tab>Comment avez-vous deviné<var 1D /var>? Ah... J'imagine que la présence de mes compagnons vous a sûrement aiguillé<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var>...

source: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_STRANGERABBIT_000_072<tab>And a happy Hatching<var 1F /var>tide to thee, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_STRANGERABBIT_000_072<tab>Tout le monde se prend au jeu de la chasse aux Prœufs.♪

source: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_STRANGERABBIT_000_073<tab>Verily, by simply exchanging these words, I daresay I can feel a measure of jubilation in mine heart.
target: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_STRANGERABBIT_000_073<tab>Je commence à connaître cette chansonnette par cœur, à force, et je dois avouer qu'elle est plutôt entraînante<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_STRANGERABBIT_000_074<tab>Art thou quite well, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?
target: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_STRANGERABBIT_000_074<tab>Que... que vous arrive-t-il<var 1D /var>? Vous avez de la fièvre<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_GROWINGWAY_000_075<tab>Ack! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>'s found us! I wasn't expecting a reunion.
target: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_GROWINGWAY_000_075<tab>Ouaaaah<var 1D /var>! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, quel plaisir de vous voir<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_GROWINGWAY_100_075<tab>...Not that we're up to anything, mind you! We simply wanted to experience Etheirys's famed seasonal celebrations.
target: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_GROWINGWAY_100_075<tab>On voulait absolument voir à quoi ressemblait un festival sur Ætherys, et Urianger a accepté de nous accompagner<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_COOKINGWAY_000_076<tab>It's been an exemplary learning experience thus far. And I swear we haven't taken any samples that that anyone will miss!
target: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_COOKINGWAY_000_076<tab>On a bien fait de venir, c'est génial<var 1D /var>! C'est incroyable comme la forêt ici est différente de celle du Labyrinthos, avec toutes ces magnifiques décorations<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_STRANGERABBIT_000_077<tab>To study such traditions is valuable indeed, for naught reflecteth a culture more clearly than what it hath codified in ritual.
target: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_STRANGERABBIT_000_077<tab>Ce genre d'événements sert également à renforcer les liens entre habitants, vous voyez. Y assister est le meilleur moyen d'en apprendre plus sur les coutumes d'Ætherys.

source: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_STRANGERABBIT_000_078<tab>...Pray tell, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─who are thy charming companions?
target: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_STRANGERABBIT_000_078<tab>Et que sont ces adorables créatures<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_GROWINGWAY_000_079<tab>F-For me? Well, thank you so much! Er, I think...
target: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_GROWINGWAY_000_079<tab>Euuuh... Il m'a donné un truc<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_COOKINGWAY_000_080<tab>Is this...a lemon muffin? <sniff> <sniff> But no...the aroma is entirely different.
target: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_COOKINGWAY_000_080<tab>Un muffin au citron<var 1D /var>? Non... Ça sent le sucre et la douceur... C'est un aliment que je n'ai encore jamais mangé<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_STRANGERABBIT_000_081<tab>Ornamental eggs and baked desserts? I see...thou art lending thine aid in spreading good cheer for the season. I am full glad to accept thy gifts.
target: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_STRANGERABBIT_000_081<tab>Je vois, les œufs contiennent des biscuits... Et vous aidez à les distribuer, alors<var 1D /var>? Eh bien merci, je vais me faire un plaisir de les déguster avec Growingway et Cookingway.

source: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_STRANGERABBIT_000_082<tab>...Pray forgive our haste, but my companions have much yet to see. A happy Hatching<var 1F /var>tide to thee and thine.
target: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_STRANGERABBIT_000_082<tab>Bon, nous n'allons pas vous accaparer plus longtemps. Et puis, nous devons encore étudier l'architecture des bâtiments de Gridania.

source: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_COOKINGWAY_000_060<tab>Thanks for the treat! Why, I do believe I'll try to bake up a batch myself when I get back to my kitchen!
target: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_COOKINGWAY_000_060<tab>Merci pour les gâteaux<var 1D /var>! Je vais profiter de cette occasion pour apprendre à les faire moi-même, tiens<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_GROWINGWAY_000_060<tab>Till we meet again, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Perhaps even purposely, next time!
target: TEXT_FESEST2022RECOLLECTION_00779_GROWINGWAY_000_060<tab>À bientôt, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>! J'espère que nous pourrons bientôt nous promener ensemble à nouveau<var 1D /var>!
